en: ' lap ' comes from Onomatopoeia .
zh: 'lap'来自小野matopoeia。

en: It 's a completed term , but it is supposed to come from ' Flap ! '
zh: 这是一个完成的术语,但它应该来自“Flap!”.

en: You can make the word ' pen ' as ' penn ' or even ' pen ' .
zh: 你可以把字笔当成笔,甚至当成笔.

en: It should make some sense , so that it will be easier to learn and speak with [ Example : Do n't use oh as e , hello as llo , and See ya as c yah ) .
zh: 这应该有一点道理,以便更容易学习和说话[例如:不要用哦为e,你好为llo,并请看你为cyah)。

en: Place a drop or two on a cotton ball .
zh: 把一两滴放在棉球上。

en: There are electronic units sold that emit an ultrasonic beeping sound that rodents hate .
zh: 出售的电子装置发出一种恶虫讨厌的超声蜂鸣声。

en: Use a commercial , organic deterrent .
zh: 使用一种商业的有机威慑剂。

en: " Barn cats " may not be socialized well with humans , although used to hunting mice for food .
zh: “Barncats”可能与人类没有良好的社交关系,虽然习惯于猎老鼠吃东西。

en: Even if you do not have a cat , you can use used kitty litter to deter mice .
zh: 即使你没有一只猫,也可以用旧猫litter来阻止老鼠。

en: However , it is okay to wash just a few items with them , like blue jeans .
zh: 不过,只要用它们洗几件东西就行了,比如蓝色牛仔裤。

en: Think similar clothing , minus the twisty-ness .
zh: 设想相似的衣服,减掉扭曲性。

en: Move the strap adjusters around .
zh: 把腰带调节器移动四周。

en: Depending on the adjusters , you may be able to leave them a little loose too .
zh: 根据调整器的不同情况,您可能会让它们松散一点。

en: Plastic - type twist ties will hold up in the wash , but may or may not melt in your dryer .
zh: 塑料型扭链将保持在洗涤中,但可能或可能不会在干燥器中融化.

en: Tape the bottom of the box securely so that it does n't give way .
zh: 安全地粘贴箱底部以便它不会让步。

en: Never fill a box until it is so heavy that you ca n't lift it safely .
zh: 永远不要填一个箱子直到它太重,你不能安全地举起来。

en: Pack the lighter items on top .
zh: 包装上较轻的物品。

en: Do n't label boxes with contents if the contents are valuable .
zh: 如果内容有价值的话,不要用内容标签框。

en: National superstores  will let you walk the store for boxes when they are stocking the stores between 11 pm and 1 am .
zh: 全国超级市场会在下午11点至上午1点之间存货时让您步行到商店里去寻找箱子。

en: While skydiving , it is possible  that both your primary and reserve parachutes will malfunction , leaving you with no method of reducing your velocity .
zh: 在跳伞的过程中,你的初级降落伞和备用降落伞可能会失效,从而无法降低速度。

en: A strategy that might prove helpful is to consider how fortunate you are that life has been good to you so far .
zh: 一个可以证明有帮助的策略就是考虑你有多幸运,因为迄今为止你的生活对你很好。

en: If , after total chute failure , you land on something soft , it is possible that instead of being killed outright , you may be permanently paralyzed due to spinal injury .
zh: 如果在完全坠落失败后,你落在软体上,有可能直接死亡而不是由于脊椎损伤永久瘫痪。

en: If you 're a chronic procrastinator , you know the pain and stress that comes with putting things off .
zh: 如果你是一个长期拖延的人,你知道拖延事情带来的痛苦和压力。

en: Although you may have the desire to accomplish something , getting the motivation to do it is a different matter .
zh: 虽然你可能有达到某事的愿望,但gettingthemotivationtodoitisadifferentmatter。

en: Simply force yourself to use the next 120 seconds to be productive and do the duty you normally would push off for hours or days .  .
zh: 简单地强迫自己利用接下来的120秒来生产并完成你通常会推开数小时或几天的职责。

en: If you ca n’t seem to focus and are working half - heartedly at your tasks , give yourself a brief break .
zh: 如果你似乎没有集中注意力并且在做任务时半心半意地工作的话,请给自己一个短暂的休息时间。

en: However you do n't have to have magical powers to play .
zh: 不过你不必拥有魔力来玩。

en: Brooms can be a hindrance however , so feel free to not use brooms .
zh: 不过扫帚是障碍物,所以不用扫帚吧。

en: Ideally the quaffle and bludgers should be slightly deflated so that they are easier to throw and catch .
zh: 理想情况下,夸夫尔和布鲁杰尔应该稍微放宽,以便更容易投掷和捕获。

en: Chasers try to score by throwing the quaffle into one of the three goal hoops .
zh: 传球员试图通过投quaffle进入三个进球hoop中的一个球中得分。

en: Each score is worth 10 points .
zh: 每个分数都值10分。

en: Seekers try to tackle the snitch  or obtain an object attached to the snitch such as a sock or flag .
zh: 寻找者试图解决缝纫或获取附着缝纫的对象,例如袜子或旗帜。

en: Regardless of method , the winning seeker wins 30 points for his or her team , unlike the books , in which the snitch is worth 150 points .
zh: 无论哪种方法,赢家赢了30分的球队,不像书中那样,在书中打分值150分。

en: It may be easier to play without brooms  .
zh: 不用扫帚可以玩得更轻松了。

en: See How to Be a Snitch in Quidditch for more information .
zh: 更多信息请参阅如何成为一个Snitch的Quidditch。

en: You can play water quidditch in a pool .
zh: 你可以在游泳池里玩水quidditch。

en: You can buy authentic looking brooms to make the game more realistic .
zh: 你可以购买真正的看起来的扫帚来使游戏更加现实。

en: Play while the seekers look for the snitch .
zh: 在求职者寻找裁缝时玩耍。

en: A ball flying in the air can hurt .
zh: 一个在空中飞行的球会受伤。

en: If you 're playing quidditch you 're probably just having fun so play nicely .
zh: 如果你正在玩quidditch你可能只是玩得很开心,所以玩得很好。

en: Place two parts water or stock to one part of quinoa in a saucepan over medium - high heat and bring to a boil .
zh: 在中高热中将两部分水或罐头放在锅里,并煮沸。

en: Try to ensure there is an al dente bite to the germ , in the same way as pasta .
zh: 尽量确保细菌有咬伤,就像面包一样。

en: Take the quinoa off the heat and let stand , covered , for 5 minutes .
zh: 把昆士忌从热中取出来,放在上面盖住5分钟。

en: Uncover and fluff with a fork .
zh: 用叉子揭开并擦拭。

en: The quinoa should look light and fluffy , and you should be able to see the germ separating from the seed .
zh: 基诺亚应该看起来光滑,你应该能够看到细菌从种子中分离出来。

en: Pour quinoa into rice cooker .
zh: 将清菜倒进米锅里。

en: Fluff with a fork and serve .
zh: 用叉子擦拭并servi。

en: Add one cup of broth and one cup of water to the saucepan and bring to a boil over medium high heat .
zh: 加入一杯汤和一杯水到锅里并在中等高温下煮沸。

en: Find multiple methods for making Skittles vodka after the jump -- and soon you 'll be tasting the rainbow !
zh: 在跳水后找到多种方法来制作雪瓶vodka--很快你会尝到彩虹的滋味!

en: However , you can put them in if you want .
zh: 然而,如果你想的话你可以把它放在里面。

en: You should experiment to find your preferred mix before making larger bottles .
zh: 在制造更大的瓶子之前,你应该尝试寻找你喜欢的混合物。

en: Filter out the remaining Skittle " insides " .
zh: 筛选出剩余的“内部”喷嘴.

en: With single servings like this , you can decide which flavor you like best and proceed to making bottles , if you desire .
zh: 这样一来,你可以决定你最喜欢哪一种口味,然后继续做瓶子,如果你想的话。

en: Strain out the Skittles using a filter , such as a paper coffee filter or a clean t - shirt .
zh: 用一种滤波器,例如纸咖啡滤波器或干净的T恤来冲洗.

en: Once the vodka is cold , it should be syrupy .
zh: 一旦vodka冷了,它应该是糖浆的.

en: Take a sieve , line it with a piece of cheesecloth  or a coffee filter , place above a large jug and pour the vodka through slowly .
zh: 取一个筛子,用一块奶布或咖啡滤波器线条它,放在一个大罐头上并慢慢倒vodka。

en: Once the first bottle has been filtered , wash out the bottle and pour the Skittles vodka back in .
zh: 一旦第一个瓶子已经过滤了,洗掉瓶子并倒进水瓶里。

en: If you want to make it more quickly , cut the skittles in half before putting them into vodka .
zh: 如果你想更快地做的话,在把它们放入伏特加之前,切成一半。

en: Or you could just scoop them out when the color dissolves .
zh: 或者你只要把颜色溶解时,就能把它们挖出来。

en: Start with small amount of vodka and Skittles at first to experiment which combination of taste suits you best .
zh: 从少量vodka和Skittles开始尝试一下你最适合的口味组合。

en: Then separate the candy and use one flavor for each bottle .
zh: 然后把糖果分开,每瓶使用一个口味。

en: If using a t - shirt to strain , be sure fabric softener or a dryer sheet had not been used with it , lets you get some extra  flavoring  .
zh: 如果使用T恤来拉伸,请确定织物软剂或干燥纸张没有用它,让你得到一些额外的香味。
